bug.author: aaronmarkham
bug.summary: engine is hardcoded in the manifest
bug.description: I'm pretty sure when I updated I have > 1.0 of MXNet. However, my manifest.json says my export used v0.12. I don't think that's true. Here's the hardcoding line: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/awslabs/mxnet-model-server/blob/c86255338edac3e4c706e9ec127fdfb17eec60c3/mms/export_model.py#L189>https://github.com/awslabs/mxnet-model-server/blob/c86255338edac3e4c706e9ec127fdfb17eec60c3/mms/export_model.py#L189</denchmark-link>
